SEARCH
Package gw.api.json.mapping

Class JsonMappingOptions

java.lang.Object
gw.api.json.mapping.JsonMappingOptions
public class JsonMappingOptions extends Object
Specifies options that affect how mapping transformations are done. Options include:
  • whether to throw an exception if the transform encounters errors (default: true)
  • whether to allow for potentially-infinite-recursion (default: false)
  • the gw.api.json.filter.Filter to apply (default: none)

    • withThrowOnErrors

      public JsonMappingOptions withThrowOnErrors(boolean throwOnErrors)
      Sets the throwOnErrors option. If throwOnErrors is true (the default), the transform methods on JsonMapping will throw an exception if any errors were encountered during the transform
      Parameters:
      throwOnErrors - the value of the throwOnErrors option
      Returns:
      this JsonMappingOptions for chained calls

    • withAllowSchemaRecursion

      public JsonMappingOptions withAllowSchemaRecursion(boolean allowSchemaRecursion)
      Sets the allowSchemaRecursion option. If allowSchemaRecursion is false (the default), the transform will track the stack of transforming objects and throw an exception if the mapping transform recurses back to the same object (as defined by the object's equals() and hashCode() methods) and mapper.
      Parameters:
      allowSchemaRecursion - the value of the allowSchemaRecursion option
      Returns:
      this JsonMappingOptions for chained calls

    • withInitialCacheValues

      public JsonMappingOptions withInitialCacheValues(Map<Object,Object> initialCacheValues)
      Sets the initialCacheValues option. The initialCacheValues will be added to the TransformCache before mapping transforms are started, allowing the caller to pre-compute cached values that can then be used by any of the mapping properties being evaluated.
      Parameters:
      initialCacheValues - a Map of values that will be added to the TransformCache prior to mapping transforms
      Returns:
      this JsonMappingOptions for chained calls

    • withOnlyEventSafeProperties

      public JsonMappingOptions withOnlyEventSafeProperties(boolean onlyEventSafeProperties)
      Sets the onlyEventSafeProperties option. If set to true, any mapping properties that are not safe for use in AppEvents will be excluded from the output. Mapping properties can be explicitly marked as event-safe or unsafe via the "eventSafe" property, otherwise the mapping property's path will be statically analyzed to determine if it's safe. If unspecified, this option defaults to false.
      Parameters:
      onlyEventSafeProperties - true to only include mapping properties that are safe for use with AppEvents
      Returns:
      this JsonMappingOptions for chained calls

    • withIncludeLocalizationLanguages

      public JsonMappingOptions withIncludeLocalizationLanguages(@NotNull @NotNull Set<LanguageType> languageTypes)
      Provide a set of language typecodes to be used for returning localized values for the specified languages, in addition to the language that the mapping call is made in.
      Parameters:
      languageTypes -
      Returns:
      this JsonMappingOptions for chained calls

      The Map of values to add to the TransformCache prior to mapping transforms
      Returns:
      the Map of values to add to the TransformCache prior to mapping transforms, or null if there are no initial values to add

    • isOnlyEventSafeProperties

      public boolean isOnlyEventSafeProperties()
      Returns the value of the onlyEventSafeProperties option
      Returns:
      true if the transform should only include properties safe for use with AppEvents, false otherwise

    • getMappingPathPredicate

      public MappingPathPredicate getMappingPathPredicate()
      Returns the MappingPathPredicate to apply to the transform, or null if no MappingPathPredicate should be used

    • getIncludeLocalizationLanguages

      public Set<LanguageType> getIncludeLocalizationLanguages()
      Returns the set of languages to be used for additional localizations beyond the language that the mapping call is made in. If the set is empty, no extra localizations were requested.
